eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons

Class Subscription

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons.Subscription

  • public class Subscription
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a subscription to a remote publishing object's event channels. For each remote publishing object that this local object is subscribed to, only one instance of this class is created, even if the publishing object has several EventChannels open. The list of channels the local object is subscribed to on a remote object is kept inside this class as a set of event channel IDs.
    Author:
    sulfo

      Object ID of the remote publishing object.

        Adds an EventChannel into a set of those channels that the local object is subscribed to on the remote publishing object.

        Returns:

      • removeFromSubscriptions

        public boolean removeFromSubscriptions(java.lang.String eventId)
        Removes an EventChannel from a set of those channels that the local object is subscribed to on the remote publishing object.
        Parameters:
        eventId - Event ID.
        Returns:
        False when there is no such subscription, true otherwise.
